sentences.sContent: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.sCn: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.sContent: He was still in his work clothes.
...All the clothes are similar to the space suits designs that kept astronauts comfortable in the temperatures of the moon...
...She never bought clothes and always wore the same long...
...We don't buy clothes we can't try on...
...we couldn't use certain bathrooms or try on clothes in stores...

phrases.pCn: 挂衣服的架子；衣架（等于coat hanger）

trans.tranOther: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm
